112.content:
Jordan amd Olivia are home alone at a sleepiver at Jordan's house. The girls are in armless tops that don't cover their bellies and panties. Olivia is jealous of Jordan because she is much prettier than her. She wanted to get back at Jordan because she was seen kissing a boy sje likes at school. "Jordan do you think we an test these handcuffs I stole off my brother because he thinks they are real." olivia asked in a really sweet way. "Sure we can" said Jordan.
"Yay! Okay lie on the floor and put you're hands above you're head" Jordan did as she was told. Olivia quickly snapped the cuffs on one of Jordan's hands then around one of the bed legs and snapped it on to her other hand. "Try and move" Olivia giggled knowing Jordan was unable to escape. "I can't I'm completly stuck" she giggled.
"Good" Olvia laughed "now we can talk about you kissing Conner even though you know I like him!" she sounded abit more serious but not to threatening. "I'm sorry Olivia but it just happened i swear!" she said qucikly.
"Oh yeah with this is what you get!" she yelled. She quickly started tickling Jordan's exposed belly. AHAHAHAHAHA!! She laughed as she didn't expect this.

13.title: samantha and nina

133.content: samantha was at nina's house. they were both trying to figure out what to do. samantha suggested that they try something different than watching tv. so, she and nina agreed to have a tickle fight. samantha went across the street to her house and grabbed a bikini. meanwhile, nina was changing into a bikini as well. when they both got changed, they agreed upon the rules. each person would be tied down and tickled by the other for 20 minutes. any TICKLING tools could be used. they each take turns until somone gives up. the loser has to be the tickle slave of the other for a month. now, who goes first
133.title: we fight all day, we fight all night

1331.content: Sammantha decided she will go first. She gets tied down spread eagle. The next question is where to start ?
1331.title: samantha

13312.content:
Nina ties Samantha up, spread eagle, onto her bed while starting a timer. "Whoever gives up earlier on the timer looses okay" Nina told "I know, I know" Samantha annoyingly agreed. "Now, where to start?" Nina teasingly said as she dragged her finger along Samantha's belly. Samantha sucked in her belly as a reaction. "Oooh, it seems somebody has a tiiiicklish belly" Nina teased as she unleashed all of her fingers to lightly tickle and tease Samantha. "Hehehehehahaha, stohohop thahat" Samantha giggled as she sqirmed in her bonds. "Aww, is someone ticklish, koochie koochie cooo" Nina spoke as she began to increase the speed of her tickling. "Hahaha, I'll gehehehehaha I'll get you bahahahack!" Samantha laughed as she wiggled around. "Squirm all you want, there's no escaping me Samantha, I'm going to torture you for awhile" Nina added as she continued to tickle her friends belly. "How about this!" Nina quickly said as she blew multiple raspberries into her helpless friends belly. "Hahahaha hahahaha hahahaha noohohohohohahahaha!" Samantha laughed as she helplessly flopped in her bonds and did nothing but laugh. "Ready to give up Samantha" asked Nina. "Noohohohohohahahaha, not yehehet hahahahahahaha" Samantha laughed. "Well then I guess it's time for me to tickle somewhere else" Nina looked at the timer, 5 minutes.

Where will Nina tickle next?
13312.title: Belly

133121.content:
Nina quickly makes her way into Samantha's underarms, knowing they are her most ticklish as its also her most ticklish spot. Samantha quickly realises this and bucks, twists and struggles in her bonds to get Nina away from her underarm, however helpless it may be. Nina was determined to win and she knew this was her best shot, she immediately dug in her fingers and wiggled then furiously, and used her nails to lightly scratch and torment Samantha.
Samantha jerked back, arched and screaming with laughter, barley being able to talk.
"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I BEG YOU NOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Samantha begged as she had her underarms attacked.
"Aw, is someone super ticklish here, I think I'll continuously tickle you here until you give up, or you could stop me tickling you and give up now" Nina teased.
"NEVERHAHAHAHAHAH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA! STOHOHOHOHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! GET - HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA! NO PLEASE HAHAHAHA HAHAHAHA HAHA!" Samantha continued to plead for her life but she knew Nina wouldn't give up until she broke, she knew she didn't have long.

5 minutes past and Samantha was on the verge of breaking, with Nina’s teasing and cooing not making it any better.
" Coochie Coochie coo, someone's very ticklish, are you going to give up now?" Nina tormented.
Not being able to take another second of this Samantha gave in to her ticklish torture.
"GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I GIHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH! I GIVE HAHAHAHA HAHAHAHA HA! I CAN'T TAKE THIHEHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOHOHOHOHEHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
"Good, took you long enough" Nina smirked as she stopped the timer, '10:41', she just had to beat that time and she would get to tickle Samantha for the next month.

Nina released Samantha who by this point was gasping for air, and they both took a break.

Afterwards Nina layed on her bed as Samantha tied her up in the same spread eagle position that Samantha was in.
"Now, I'm going to break you!" Samantha told as she started the timer. This made Nina extremely nervous but she knew how long she needed to last.

Where does Samantha start tickling?
133121.title: Underarms

choices: 10:42 Nina wins and gets to tickle Samantha for a month
10:40 Samantha wins a d gets to tickle Nina for a month
1331211.content:
Samantha immediately dug her nails into Ninas underarms, being both of their most ticklish spots. Nina jolted back, her head layed back with her mouth wide open laughing from her intense tickling.
"EEEEEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! DAHAHAHRN YOU SAMANATHAHAHAHA! BIHIHIHITCH! AHAHAHAHA!"

"Aww, is someone ticklish, coochie coochie coo, just give up and it'll all be over" teased Samantha
"NOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I WILL NEHEHEHEHAHAHAHA BEAT YOU HAHAHAHA!"
This annoyed Samantha, Nina was being annoying resistant and at this rate she'll beat her time and tickle her for another month. Trying to find a way to make her break Samantha surprisingly stopped for a moment, confusing Nina.
" We're allowed to use tools remember" Samantha said, smearing oil over Nina’s underarms. Nina knew what was coming, damn Samantha for being so smart, she just had to hold out a few more minutes and she'll be fine. Reading the clock it read 2 minutes 20 seconds, that can't be right? It felt like forever she was being tickled and now it's going to be so much worse!

"NOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NAHAHAHAHAHAHAT THERE! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" screamed Nina as Samantha began to tickle her, even faster than before. Nina just had to remember what she was fighting for, a whole month to tickle Samantha and not herself being tickled, so she endured, laughing crazily and squirming every which way to try and escape her tickling.
"EEEEEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! OH MY OH MY AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! OH NY GOHOHOHOHOHOD! FUHUHUHUHUCK! DAHAHAHAHAHAMN IHIHIHIT! PLEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! FUHUHUCK YOHOHOU! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"
"Well that's not very nice, say sorry and give up now" Samantha teased and she sped up her tickling
"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I'M SOHOHORRY! HAHAHAHA HAHAHAHA HAHAHA! STOHOHOHOHOP! PLEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! TICKLE SOMEWHERE ELSEHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Continuing some more tickling which felt like forever Nina looked back to the timer, '8:07', okay not too bad but could be better considering she's on the verge of snapping and giving up right now.
"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! FUHUHUHUCK HAHAHAHA! GET OUT OF MY ARMPIHIHITS HAHAHAHAHAHA!" Nina begged, her face turning red with her body sweating all over.
"Just give up and it'll all be over, we both know you can't stand too much longer so why not give up now"

Looking back to the clock it finally reaches 10 minutes, Samantha is getting desperate and decides to quickly dose Nina’s armpits with fresh oil and tickle her as quickly as she can while teasing her.
"Com'n Nina, why not have it stop earlier rather than later, I bet you can't wait for me to stop, it must tickle sooooo muuuuuuch, all you have to say is 'I give up' and I'll stop"

"EEEEEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I CAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAN'T PLEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOHOHOHOHOP!" Nina begged, she couldn't take anymore, the tickling is too much for her to bear any longer.
"I GIHEHEHEHEHEVE HAHAHAHA HA I GIHEHEHEHEHEVE UHUHUHAP! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHA!"

Immediately stopping the timer, Samantha looked at the clock worryingly and read out...
